alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 1:23PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Montezuma and west central La Plata Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 123 PM MDT, Doppler radar and satellite imagery were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mancos, or 26 miles west of Durango, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail possible. SOURCE...Radar and satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mancos around 135 PM MDT. This includes U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 50 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains
